example.text: This celebrated treatise, usually known as" The Art of Courtly Love", lies at the origin of the legend of the Courts of Love, tribunals before which lovers were supposed to bring their quarrels in order to have them adjudicated by authorities in the art of love like Eleanor of Aquitaine and her daughter.
